page.title: 08Local Memories continued
page.content: Mrs Townley used to be a teacher at Maghull C of E and tells a story of an experience the took her back in time. "Mrs Townley was waiting for a bus at the end of Dodds Lane when she noticed the road surface had been worn away to reveal the original surface.This took her back in time to when the local farmers used to go to the pub and have a few drinks on their way to market. One farmer had too much and only just got into his cart.Luckily the horse knew his way home but as they went over a bridge the farmer fell of the back and broke his leg. The horse just carried on and went into the stable when he got home. That is where the farmers wife found the horse and cart and realised something had happened. Luckily she found her husband and brought him home.
